University Student Senate Meeting

Nov 6, 2008

If you can’t tell by our stern expressions and sincere focus, the University Student Senate at the New School has been making amazing progress this year with implementing initiatives around environmental sustainability, ethical institutional investments, and minority services.  These photos are from the November 5th meeting.
